value.title: Pet dog in Hong Kong with coronavirus dies after returning from quarantine virus-free
value.excerpt: The Hong Kong pet dog that was tested for coronavirus has died two days after being released from a government quarantine having been declared virus-free. value.title: Poland to receive protective gear, tests from China to fight coronavirus

value.title: Japan testing for coronavirus at fraction of capacity

value.title: China says coronavirus pandemic exposed global health system's shortcomings
value.excerpt: China’s foreign ministry said on Wednesday that the coronavirus pandemic that has infected more than 160,000 people globally has exposed shortcomings in the global health system. Foreign ministry spokesman Geng Shuang told reporters during a daily briefing that China calls on the international community to prioritise public health security.
